name: Card Hero (Sol220)
description:
What happens to the player when they are only given a limited amount of tools in order to complete a level? Try out my new game prototype "Card Hero" and find out!!
Twitter Thread Link: https://twitter.com/bradshaw_euan/status/1612225970253058049
Card Hero is a 2D platformer with some minor puzzle/strategy elements.

Play the game and complete the levels become the card hero!
